LightningComponentBundle.description: A configurable related list component that supports Files, Internal Asset Requests, and Knowledge Articles

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: The parent record ID. Use {!recordId} to dynamically use the current record ID.

property.name: selectedObject
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Enter the API name of the object to display. Examples: 'Files' (for file attachments), 'Account', 'Case', 'Internal_Asset_Request__c', 'Knowledge__kav'

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Record Limit
property.description: Maximum number of records to display before showing 'View All'
